channel.title: Looking for hoster
channel.description:
I'm searching for a hoster for my server. Needs to be online fairly often. Also need to be able to receive continuous updates for the server as I hope to be updating a lot. If you pretend to want to host my server to steal it, don't bother. Also, hoster get co-ownership.
Many Thanks,
Syrillia[br][size=1]Posted on: 28-10-2007, 00:05:31[/size][hr]Does no-one want to host dear Syrillia's Server?

item.title: Looking for hoster
item.dc:creator: @Xblad3rX Xblad3rX
item.description:
@Xblad3rX wrote:

I’ll gladly help, read you PM it has the times i can host, and my msn. Any questions? On msn i tried to add you. I don’t think you accepted LOL.

~Blader

p.s I would never steal a source/server/client ANYTHING. Anyways me pimping one and some others are working on our own project. So that wont be done for a while.

Read full topic
